applications.title: Areas of Application
applications.description: Our laser cleaning technology is suitable for a wide range of applications, including marine and nautical equipment:
items: Residential: Fences, gates, and metal structures
Cultural sites: Monuments and historical metal artifacts
Marine: Boats, yachts, and maritime equipment
Nautical: Anchors, propellers, and other boat parts
Docks and Marinas: Metal structures exposed to saltwater

marineCleaning.title: Marine Laser Cleaning
marineCleaning.description: Our specialized laser cleaning service is perfect for the marine industry. We can effectively remove rust, barnacles, and other contaminants from boats, yachts, and various maritime equipment. Our process is gentle on the underlying material, making it ideal for preserving the integrity of your valuable marine assets while restoring their appearance and functionality.

zap.title: Laser cleaning of metal surfaces
zap.description: Fast and efficient removal of rust, paint, oxides, and dirt from metal structures while preserving the original texture of the material.

building.title: Facade restoration of buildings
building.description: Cleaning facades from graffiti, dirt, mold, and old paint layers while preserving the aesthetics and historical value of the building.

ship.title: Cleaning of yachts and vessels
ship.description: Removal of algae, old coatings, and dirt from the hulls of yachts and vessels. Preparation for painting or corrosion protection.

landmark.title: Restoration of sculptures and monuments
landmark.description: Delicate cleaning of historical monuments and sculptures from dirt, graffiti, or mold while fully preserving their structure and texture.

truck.title: Cleaning and preparation of equipment for priming and painting
truck.description: Laser removal of old coatings from cars, agricultural machinery, or construction machines. Preparation for further protection or painting.

spray.title: Eco-friendly graffiti removal
spray.description: Safe and quick removal of graffiti from facades, shop windows, sculptures, or other objects without damaging the material.

industry.title: Removal of scale and oil contamination
industry.description: Cleaning industrial pipes, tanks, and equipment from scale, oils, and other contaminants. Improving equipment efficiency.

paintBucket.title: Post-cleaning treatment: priming and painting
paintBucket.description: Application of primer and paint after cleaning for long-lasting protection and aesthetic appearance.

blinds.title: Cleaning, restoration, and painting of shutters
blinds.description: Cleaning shutters from graffiti, dirt, and old paint. Restoration of damaged surfaces and application of new paint to restore aesthetics.

clock.title: Regular maintenance of objects
clock.description: Offering continuous cleaning and surface treatment to maintain their perfect condition.

project1.title: Restoration of Rusty Gates

project2.title: Yacht Hull Cleaning
project2.description: Removal of algae and marine growth from the hull of a luxury yacht, improving its performance and appearance.

project3.title: Industrial Equipment Maintenance
project3.description: Precise cleaning of sensitive industrial equipment, extending its service life and efficiency.

project4.title: Preservation of a Historical Monument
